notices.failedToConvertNoFile: Failed to convert sandbox: no such file or directory
notices.failedToConvertGeneral: Failed to convert sandbox note to file. See console for details.

firstLineAsTitle.name: First line as title
firstLineAsTitle.desc: Use the first line of the note as the title.

useObsidianDefaultLocation.name: Use Obsidian default location
useObsidianDefaultLocation.desc: If enabled, converted notes will respect the 'Default location for new notes' setting defined in Obsidian's Files & Links preferences.

customDefaultSaveLocation.name: Custom default save location
customDefaultSaveLocation.desc: The default folder path where converted notes will be saved. Must end with a slash (/) for a folder. (Ignored if 'Use Obsidian default location' is enabled).

confirmBeforeSaving.name: Confirm save location before converting
confirmBeforeSaving.desc: If enabled, a modal will appear to choose the file path every time you convert a sandbox note.

saveToVaultOnCommand.name: Save to vault on command
saveToVaultOnCommand.desc: If enabled, the note will be saved to the vault when you execute the save command (Ctrl+S or Cmd+S).

showDebugMessages.name: Show debug messages
showDebugMessages.desc: Enable or disable debug messages in the console.

fileName.name: File Name
fileName.desc: Enter the file name (extension will be added automatically)

folderPath.name: Folder Path
folderPath.desc: Enter folder path (leave empty for vault root)
